I love you Shannon. -- Rob Rogers Website --> www.dmunkie.org Blog --> dmunkie.blogspot.com E-mail --> rob.rogers@gmail.com/drunknmunkie@gmail.com

I had a really awesome night with my girl tonight. I picked her up from work, then we went to my store to visit. From there on we went to Logan's in Fair Lakes and had a wonderful dinner. I took her back to her work to get her car, and then we parted ways for te evening. It was awesome. I LOVE YOU SHANNON!! Peace, Rob
ACK! I double posted, i'm such a shit. i like this blog thingy. easy to update, and easy to use. Mad have to code one for my self. PHP or COLDFUSION. Hmmm!! will have to see!.

I recently received my second PDA, a DELL AXIM X30 HIGH. 624mhz 64 RAM and ROM. nice deally, pretty screen. built in wireless. not too shabby. it replaces my HP 2215, which is only 2 months old. the HP is killer too, but the DELL is great for watching Movies and playing games. Peace!

I have downloaded and watch the latest movies: Garfield Van Helsing Stepford Wives HArry Potter 3 Hell Boy Chronicles of Riddick The Girl NExt Door Shrek 2 If you want them e-mail me. I'll put them up on my server so you can d/l them. PEACE, Rob

The DELL AXIM X30 HIGH is my new PDA, it replaces my 3 month old HP2215. the DEll has a brightr screen, double the ram, and a 624 mhz processor. the HP had a 400mhz. the dell is perfect for watching movies and playing video games. te litle speaker is weak than the HP, but is better sounding in headphones than the HP is. goto --> http://www.dell.com. they start at $199. peace, Rob urlLink Blogger Help : What is BlogThis! ?
